quizArena.title: Zukkoo
quizArena.description: Test your knowledge in a classic quiz format.
instructions: Find the single correct answer out of 4 options.
Pay attention to time: the faster you answer, the more points you get!
Monitor the live leaderboard on the main screen after every question.

logicChain.title: Logic Chain
logicChain.description: Arrange the items in the correct logical sequence.
instructions: Drag the blocks and arrange them in the correct sequence from top to bottom.
The more accurate and faster your chain, the higher your score!
If you make a mistake, the system will show you the correct path.

battleOfTerms.title: Battle of Terms
battleOfTerms.description: Match the correct terms with their definitions.
instructions: Tap a term and its definition consecutively to match them.
Correct pairs disappear, while mistakes cost you precious time.
Aim for maximum accuracy to earn the 'Combo' bonus.

blitzWatch.title: Blitz-Watch
blitzWatch.modalSubtitle: Are you ready for the knowledge race? ‚ö°
blitzWatch.description: Quickly decide if the statement is True or False.
instructions: You have only 3-5 seconds for each question.
Only two choices: True (Green) or False (Red).
Don't make a mistake, or you'll lose your speed streak!

hiddenCode.title: Hidden Code
hiddenCode.description: Unscramble the letters to find the hidden scientific term.
instructions: Assemble a meaningful IT term from scrambled letters.
Uncover the hidden code by placing each letter in its correct place.
If you struggle, use the 'Help' button (but it costs points!).

teamRescue.title: Team Rescue
teamRescue.description: Collaborate with your team to solve advanced challenges.
instructions: You are part of a team, every answer matters for the group.
Correct answers bring the team closer to the finish line.
Don't make mistakes, otherwise your team's overall 'life' decreases.
